title: RoC Retinol Correxion Under Eye Cream for Dark Circles & Puffiness, Daily Wrinkle Cream, Anti Aging Line Smoothing Skin Care Treatment 0.5 oz (Packaging May Vary)
description:
Specially formulated for the delicate eye area, it visibly reduces wrinkles around the eyes and crow's feet in 12 weeks. In addition, it evens out dark circles and reduces puffiness in 4 weeks. Product is Non-comedogenic and dermatologist tested.
Retinol is a retinoid, a derivative of vitamin A that naturally occurs in skin. Our exclusive formula accelerates the removal of old, dull skin cells on the surface revealing fresh, new ones. The result is vibrant and healthier-looking skin.
